title: 97/581/EC: Commission Decision of 25 July 1997 amending Decision 95/30/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products originating in Morocco (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 25 July 1997 amending Decision 95/30/EC laying down special conditions governing imports of fishery and aquaculture products originating in Morocco (Text with EEA relevance) (97/581/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B to Decision 95/30/EC is hereby replaced by the Annex hereto.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 332, 30. 12. 1995, p. 40.
(3) OJ No L 42, 24. 2. 1995, p. 32.
ANNEX
'ANNEX B
